trans-unit.source: Provides support for the behavior that enables [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] endpoints to receive HTTP requests from a browser-based ASP.NET AJAX client.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte para o comportamento que permite [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] pontos finais para receber pedidos HTTP a partir de um cliente do ASP.NET AJAX baseada no browser.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: When applied to an endpoint, the WebScriptEnablingBehavior behavior enables [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] and ASP.NET AJAX integration, except for the support required for JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) encoding.
trans-unit.target: Quando aplicado a um ponto final, o comportamento de WebScriptEnablingBehavior permite [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] e a integração do ASP.NET AJAX, exceto para o suporte necessário para a codificação de JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).

trans-unit.source: Various types of encoding, including JSON, are enabled by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement> or by an appropriately configured <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Vários tipos de codificação, incluindo JSON, são ativados pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement>ou por um <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> adequadamente configurado</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebMessageEncodingElement>

trans-unit.source: The WebScriptEnablingBehavior behavior implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> and inherits from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>, which enables the more general Web programming model for [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services exposing non-SOAP endpoints.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento de WebScriptEnablingBehavior implementa o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>e herda <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior>, que permite que o modelo de programação Web mais geral para [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] serviços exposição pontos finais SOAP não.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the WebScriptEnablingBehavior: - Enables the HTTP programming model, including dispatch to operations based on a URL suffix, support for HTTP verb selection (POST or GET) and HTTP cache duration control.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, o WebScriptEnablingBehavior:-permite que o modelo de programação HTTP, incluindo emissão operações com base num sufixo de URL, suporte para a seleção de verbo HTTP (POST ou GET) e controlo de duração de cache HTTP.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the HTTP programming model, see [WCF Web HTTP Programming Model Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]a programação de HTTP de modelo, consulte [WCF Web HTTP programação descrição geral do modelo](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Note that the default HTTP verb is POST when using this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que o verbo HTTP de predefinição é POST ao utilizar este comportamento.

trans-unit.source: - Enables the correct formatter for each operation's request and response messages - for example, support for URL parameters.
trans-unit.target: -Permite que o formatador correto para pedido e resposta a mensagens cada operação – por exemplo, suporte para os parâmetros de URL.

trans-unit.source: - Enables the JavaScript Proxy endpoint.
trans-unit.target: -Permite que o ponto final de Proxy com JavaScript.

trans-unit.source: To call a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service from an ASP.NET AJAX client, the service must be configured with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> binding and the WebScriptEnablingBehavior must be added to the endpoint behavior collection.
trans-unit.target: Para chamar um [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] serviço a partir de um cliente do ASP.NET AJAX, o serviço tem de ser configurado com o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>enlace e a WebScriptEnablingBehavior tem de ser adicionado à coleção de comportamento de ponto final.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: This can be done either in configuration by adding the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement> or without using configuration by activating the AJAX endpoint with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory> instead of the default factory in the [@ServiceHost](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) directive in the .svc file.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode ser feito na configuração, adicionando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement>ou sem utilizar a configuração, ativar o ponto final de AJAX com o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory>em vez da fábrica de predefinição no [ @ServiceHost ](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) diretiva no ficheiro. svc.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.WebScriptServiceHostFactory> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] different ways to enable a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service to respond to ASP.NET AJAX clients, see [Creating WCF Services for ASP.NET AJAX](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]diferentes formas de ativar um [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] serviço para responder a clientes do ASP.NET AJAX, consulte [criação de serviços de WCF para ASP.NET AJAX](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultBodyStyle%2A> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> value.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultBodyStyle%2A>para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>valor.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultBodyStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingRequestFormat%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat%2A> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> value.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingRequestFormat%2A>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat%2A>para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>valor.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingResponseFormat%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior.DefaultOutgoingRequestFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Applies the behavior to the client across an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se o comportamento para o cliente através de um ponto final.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29> method to view, modify, or add custom extension to the client runtime across all messages used with an endpoint or for specific operations.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29>método para ver, modificar ou adicionar a extensão personalizado para o tempo de execução do cliente em todas as mensagens utilizadas com um ponto final ou para operações específicas.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%28System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>que expõe o contrato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime> to which the custom behavior is applied.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime>aos quais é aplicado o comportamento personalizado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime>

trans-unit.source: Applies the behavior to the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se o comportamento de ponto final do serviço.

trans-unit.source: Normally, this method is called by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] automatically when the behavior is applied to an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, este método é denominado [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] automaticamente quando o comportamento é aplicado a um ponto final.

trans-unit.source: So there is no need to call this method manually.
trans-unit.target: Por isso, é necessário para chamar este método manualmente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>que expõe o contrato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher> to which the custom behavior is applied.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>aos quais é aplicado o comportamento personalizado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.EndpointDispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines if automatic format selection is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que determina se a seleção de formato automática está ativada.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] automatic format selection, see [WCF Web HTTP Formatting](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]seleção de formato automática, consulte [formatação de HTTP do WCF Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if automatic format selection is enabled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se estiver ativada a seleção de formato automática; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default message body style.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de corpo de mensagem predefinido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> value is the only <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> supported and setting any other value results in a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> being thrown.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>valor é o único <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>suportados e definição a qualquer outro valor resulta num <xref:System.NotSupportedException>que está a ser emitida.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle"> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: This default value is the only valid value.
trans-unit.target: Este valor predefinido é o único valor válido.

trans-unit.source: The body style set is not supported.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de estilo de corpo não é suportado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default outgoing request message format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o formato de mensagem de pedido saída do predefinido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref> used by outgoing request messages.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref> utilizado por enviar mensagens de pedido.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The message format set is not a valid value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de formato de mensagem não é um valor válido de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the default outgoing response message format.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define o formato de mensagem de resposta saída do predefinido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref> used by outgoing response messages.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref> utilizado pelo envio de mensagens de resposta.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The message format set is not a valid value of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de formato de mensagem não é um valor válido de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flag that specifies whether a FaultException is generated when an internal server error (HTTP status code: 500) occurs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o sinalizador que especifica se uma FaultException é gerada quando um erro interno do servidor (código de estado HTTP: 500) ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the flag is enabled; otherwise returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o sinalizador estiver ativado; caso contrário, devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines if the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] REST Help page is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que determina se o [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] página de ajuda de REST está ativada.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] REST Help page, see [WCF Web HTTP Service Help Page](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]o [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] página de ajuda de REST de mensagens em fila, consulte [WCF HTTP ajudar a página do serviço Web](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] REST Help page is enabled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] página de ajuda de REST está ativada; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Confirms that the endpoint meets the requirements that allow it to function as an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Confirma que o ponto final cumpre os requisitos que permitem-lhe funcionar como um ponto de final do ASP.NET AJAX.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the endpoint is not `null`, uses the HTTP or HTTPS schemes, does not use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, uses either the HTTP GET or POST verb, that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> of the binding is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A>, and that the binding contains a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> where <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.ManualAddressing%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se o ponto final não é `null`, utiliza os esquemas HTTP ou HTTPS, não utiliza o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, utiliza o verbo de HTTP GET ou POST, que o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>do enlace está definida como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A>, e que o enlace contém um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>onde <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.ManualAddressing%2A>está definido como `true`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.ManualAddressing%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.None%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: This method also checks that there are no SOAP headers or wrapper names on the methods, or other unsupported aspects of the operations.
trans-unit.target: Este método também verifica que não são cabeçalhos SOAP ou nomes de wrapper nos métodos, nem outros aspetos de implementação não suportados das operações.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>que expõe o contrato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint does not meet one of the requirements for being an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint.
trans-unit.target: O ponto final não cumpre um dos requisitos para a ser um ponto de final do ASP.NET AJAX.
